verbose_text: Upon stimulation, the IkappaB kinase (IKK) complex phosphorylates the amino-terminal serine residues (S32 and S36) of IkappaBalpha, triggering its ubiquitination and degradation by the Skp-Cullin-F-box (SCF) Ub ligase complex and the 26S-proteasome pathway, respectively.
evidence: IKK) complex phosphorylates the amino-terminal serine residues (S32 and S36) of IkappaBalpha
